bug.author: ftteh
bug.description: The application is not really saving the annotation done. Once close and open the same file, the annotation will be gone. Currently using save as instead of save to save the same file.

comments.comment: thanks for reporting <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ftteh>@ftteh</denchmark-link> ! Sounds very problematic. What operating system are you using the UDT on?
